Sentencas: Ceria-based ceramics can be considered among the most promising solid electrolytes for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells (IT-SOFC).
Titulo: Microstructural and electrical investigation of flash-sintered Gd/Sm-doped ceria

Sentencas: In the present work, variously doped nanocrystalline ceria powders were flash-sintered, and the role of doping (Gd and Sm, 5-20 mol%) and sintering aid (Li and Co) on the final microstructure and the electrical behavior was investigated.
Titulo: Microstructural and electrical investigation of flash-sintered Gd/Sm-doped ceria

Sentencas: Gd- or Sm-doped nanocrystalline ceria powders were synthesized by co-precipitation method using ammonia solution as precipitating agent.
Titulo: Microstructural and electrical investigation of flash-sintered Gd/Sm-doped ceria

Sentencas: The synthesized nanopowders were characterized by DSC-TG, XRD, and nitrogen physisorption analysis.
Titulo: Microstructural and electrical investigation of flash-sintered Gd/Sm-doped ceria

Sentencas: The nanopowders were isostatically pressed and flash-sintered.
Titulo: Microstructural and electrical investigation of flash-sintered Gd/Sm-doped ceria

Sentencas: The relative density was measured by hydrostatic balance, and the corresponding microstructure was observed by SEM.
Titulo: Microstructural and electrical investigation of flash-sintered Gd/Sm-doped ceria

Sentencas: The electrical behavior was studied by EIS.
Titulo: Microstructural and electrical investigation of flash-sintered Gd/Sm-doped ceria

Sentencas: Flash-sintered powder pellets showed different behaviors depending on the dopant and sintering aid.
Titulo: Microstructural and electrical investigation of flash-sintered Gd/Sm-doped ceria

Sentencas: The electrical conductivity of the samples increased by increasing the relative density.
Titulo: Microstructural and electrical investigation of flash-sintered Gd/Sm-doped ceria

Sentencas: Fully dense Gd-doped ceria samples, synthesized by co-precipitation, were obtained by flash sintering in very short times at 700 A degrees C.
Titulo: Microstructural and electrical investigation of flash-sintered Gd/Sm-doped ceria

Sentencas: The total conductivity was comparable to that measured on samples sintered with conventional route at much higher temperatures such as 1500 A degrees C.
Titulo: Microstructural and electrical investigation of flash-sintered Gd/Sm-doped ceria
